body.name: JBL Tune 510BT: Wireless On-Ear Headphones with Purebass Sound - Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 15 hrs 28 mins
features: The Tune 510BT wireless headphones feature renowned JBL Pure Bass sound, which can be found in the most famous venues all around the world.Specific uses for product : Personal

With Wireless Bluetooth 5.0 Streaming, you can stream wirelessly from your device and even switch between two devices so that you don't miss a call. Dynamic frequency response range (Hz) 20 Hz – 20 kHz

For long-lasting fun, listen wirelessly for up to 40 hours and recharge the battery in as little as 2 hours with the convenient Type-C USB cable. A quick 5-minute recharge gives you 2 additional hours of music.

Easily control your sound and manage your calls from your headphones with the convenient buttons on the ear-cup..Note:If you face issue in Bluetooth connectivity please turn off the Bluetooth function for a couple of minutes, then turn it back on
Siri or Hey Google is just a button away: activate the voice assistant of your device by pushing the multi-function button.
Featuring an adjustable headband the Tune 510BT are designed to fit nearly any head size comfortably
body.description: The JBL Tune 510BT headphones let you stream powerful JBL Pure Bass sound with no strings attached. Easy to use, with up to 40 hours of battery life and speed charge, they are super lightweight and comfortable. Grab them and fill your day with music!

JBL PURE BASS SOUND These wireless headphones feature the renowned JBL Pure Bass sound, which can be found in the most famous venues all around the world. Wirelessly stream this high-quality sound from your smartphone without messy cords

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great over ear headphones
reviews.reviewText: I was wearing my ear buds constantly and so my inner ear was feeling weird from not having much air circulation. Also it was a little gross, but I’m not going to go into detail about that.These came up in my search, and I figured for half price, I may as well try them. It also helped that this brand has a pretty decent reputation for me, as my dad has a fairly expensive speaker that he really likes, and I have one of the small speakers that works really well as a bath speaker.I was not disappointed. These headphones are comfortable enough, sound just fine for my constant podcast listening, easy to connect, and last quite a while on one charge.If I wear the headphones all day, they feel a little uncomfortable, but that’s probably to be expected and also not quite how most people normally use them. The sound is not good enough to replace real speakers or anything, but it is more than adequate if one is not too concerned about the sound quality.They last for a couple days on one charge for me. Since I can use them for up to 10 hours a day, this is no small feat. They also charge back up pretty quickly, so even if they run out of battery, it’s no big deal to wait it out with some earbuds for an hour or so.I would 100% buy these again if something happened to them. It’s just one of those things that I cannot do without now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars JBL Tune 510BT: Unmatched Wireless Sound in a Stylish Package
reviews.reviewText: The JBL Tune 510BT wireless on-ear headphones have exceeded my expectations, delivering an exceptional audio experience wrapped in a stylish and comfortable design.The first thing that caught my eye was the vibrant blue color – a refreshing departure from the typical headphone hues. The sleek design and medium size make them not only visually appealing but also comfortable for extended wear. The on-ear cups sit snugly without causing discomfort, and the adjustable headband ensures a perfect fit for various head sizes.Sound quality is where the JBL Tune 510BT truly shines. The Purebass technology lives up to its name, delivering deep, rich bass that adds a new dimension to my music and enhances the overall listening experience. The audio is well-balanced, providing crisp highs and clear mids, making it suitable for a variety of genres.The wireless connectivity is seamless, and pairing with my devices was a breeze. The Bluetooth range is impressive, allowing me to move around without any signal loss. The on-ear controls are intuitive and responsive, providing easy access to playback, volume adjustment, and calls.Battery life is another strong suit of these headphones. A single charge lasts for hours, making them ideal for long commutes, workouts, or extended listening sessions. The convenience of a quick charge feature ensures that even if I forget to charge them overnight, a short charging session provides enough power for a substantial listening period.The built-in microphone delivers clear and distortion-free calls, and the ambient noise reduction feature is a nice touch, ensuring crystal-clear communication even in noisy environments.What sets the JBL Tune 510BT apart is the perfect balance it strikes between style, comfort, and high-quality sound. The inclusion of the foldable design adds portability, making them an excellent choice for on-the-go use. Whether you're a music enthusiast or someone who appreciates a reliable pair of wireless headphones, the JBL Tune 510BT is a solid investment. It's a testament to JBL's commitment to delivering an outstanding audio experience in a stylish and affordable package. I wholeheartedly recommend these headphones to anyone in search of a top-tier wireless audio solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got these headphones on sale, and expected them to at least be decent since they’re from JBL… and I was surprised that they sounded great! Even if these weren’t on sale they would be worth it. They’re comfortable for at least an hour or so, have solid sound performance, no delay (unlike many Bluetooth headphones), and seem to have good battery life. I’d definitely recommend these to anyone looking for reliable Bluetooth headphones at a very reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty good headphone unit. The fit is good. I find it a tiny bit snug for long sessions but it isn't so snug that it hurts. The noise cancelation is good as well, but not exceptional. It took quite a while to pair but eventually showed up on my devices. Where it lacks a bit is in the sound quality. The bass is decent, but it lacks depth, especially in the higher notes. Overall, the sound is a little on the muddy side. However, when compared to the price I have to say you get more than your money's worth. It's probably not fair to expect $500 audio from a device worth 1/10 of that price. The reason I mention it is that many of the reviews here rave so highly about the audio quality. Perhaps those reviewers have never experienced a good headset, but my Apple Airpods offer higher quality audio, so I wasn't especially impressed. The sound quality is good, but only exceptional when you compare it to other units in this price range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Wireless Headphones For The Price!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 4 pair (3 black & 1 white) as Christmas gifts (the white was for myself just because I needed some). One of my sons & I own a pair of earbuds, but we like headphones as well. I bought him a pair along with my other son & my husband (for mowing, working on cars, etc). They connected fast with all our devices. They have very lightweight & comfortable while wearing. We also like the ability to turn the volume up & down on the side, how easy it is to turn them on & off, & I particular love the ability to answer phones & to be able to talk on my cell with them on! The volume & sound is amazing! I love how compact they are when folded up. I have never used the more expensive brands before, so I can’t compare, but I can say that we are all so pleased with these that we don’t need to own another brand. The price was great also! I caught these 50% off during Amazon’s Black Friday sale. For less that $25 before tax, we can NOT complain!
Tienen buena calidad de sonido, la batería dura días dependiendo de cuántas horas al día los utilices, son cómodos, fáciles de transportar y están hechos de materiales de calidad.

The JBL Tune 510BT wireless headphones were purchased for my son. He uses it while he waits in between his matches. He said that he used it for about 14 hours of listening before he chose to charge it and it wasn't even dead. The sound is crisp with a strong wireless connection. It's relatively durable. This was a great buy, for a great price.
Produto de ótima qualidade de som, acabamento muito bom e bateria dura bastante. Recomendo.
Excelente calidad y compra a buen precio, suenan muy bien un poco reducidos para traerlos en el cuello, pero en general muy bien
